## mean() function

Calculates the mean of the values in the vector `x`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mean<S>(x: Vector<S>): S;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | [Vector](./vector.vector.md)<!-- -->&lt;S&gt; | The vector for which to find the mean |
